about_the_game:
This story takes place on a fantastic continent where various races inhabit.
Humans, werewolves, vampires, succubi... they were unwilling to settle for a corner, so war broke out, smoke filled the air, and the flames of power struggle burned on the earth.

In the end, the vampire king emerged victorious, yet he reigned on the throne and indulged in debauchery and revelry every night.
The seeds of crisis quietly sprouted, and this continent is about to face an unprecedented disaster.
But perhaps this will become an opportunity for a reshuffle between races; Perhaps, the mainland will enter a completely new era as a result.

And what have the people on this continent done and paid for this struggle for power and honor?

The outcome is uncertain, all are variables.
All of this will be witnessed by you!





This is a puzzle game for finding faults.
In the game, you need to compare two images related to the story content to identify all the differences between them.
Each level has 3 differences, and when all the differences in the success circle are unlocked, the next level will be unlocked. After unlocking all levels, you can obtain the entire exquisite CG and gradually explore the real story of the entire game.

Which race will ultimately emerge victorious, and what kind of adventure do they have in the story?
This is an ultimate test of players' observation and focus, try to experience the complete plot through all levels!




  • Virtual Fantasy Continent Original World View and Plot
  • Distinctive and diverse roles of different races
  • A large amount of rich and exquisite CG
  • Fun and casual games, simple and enjoyable for both body and mind
  • One click skip

Elegant and cunning diplomats from neighboring countries?
She seems to have an indescribable relationship with Erinda - after all, Erinda is willing to give anything for the benefit of the human camp.
